Japanese: 欲しい欲しい欲しいっ！！
English: I want one, I want one, I want one!!

Japanese:
最新型のマリオネーションギア
が欲しいっ！
English: I want one of the newest models of Marionation Gear!

Japanese: 欲しい欲しい欲しいっ！！
English: I want one, I want one, I want ooonnnee!!

Japanese:
最新型のマリオネーションギア
が欲しいっ！
English: I want one of the newest models of Marionation Geeeaaaar!
What are you, a toddler throwing a tantrum?!

Japanese:
/pだって、いつまでも
旧式のマリオネーションギアに
乗ってるのはイヤだろ？
English: But /p was asking, how much longer are you going to make him stick it out with the old-fashioned ones?

Japanese: お前からも言ってくれよ。
English: You mean, you're asking too.
There's no helping it.

Japanese:
変形機能がついたやつとか、
動物型のやつとか、
カブトムシ型のやつとか……。
English: One that can transform, or maybe a beast-type, or even a beetle-type...

Japanese: ガロイ親方＿機嫌が悪い
そんな金がどこにある？
English: And where, exactly, are you going to get the money?

Japanese: いくらすると思ってるの？
English: Do you have any idea how much those cost?

Japanese:
それに、何ヶ月も前に予約を
入れないと買えないんだよ。
English: Besides, you can't buy one unless you've reserved it months in advance.
You're out of options.

Japanese: ガロイ親方＿まいったな

しかたない。
一度、/c5アイゼンベルグ/c3へ行って
みるか。
English:
No choice then.
Just this once, I guess we'll head to Eisenberg.

Japanese:
工房を見て回るのも
いいだろう。
English: It'd be good to have a look around the workshop there.
Eisenberg?

Japanese:
人形師の聖地アイゼンベルグ。
この地方で最も大きな街さ。
English:
Eisenberg is the holy land of mechs.
It's the largest city in the region.

Japanese:
偉大な人形師
“ガファー・アイゼンベルグ”
が住んでいたことで知られてる。
English: It's where the master technician, “Gaffer Eisenberg”, was said to have lived.

Japanese:
彼の功績をたたえて、
三十年前に街の名を
アイゼンベルグと改めた。
English: In recognition of his lifetime of achievements, they changed the name of the city to “Eisenberg” thirty years ago.

Japanese:
人形作りが盛んで、なんと、
八工房のうち三つが
アイゼンベルグにあるんだよ。
English: Mech creation is thriving there, plus somehow, three of the Hachi Workshops are all there as well.

Japanese:
八工房が三つか。
そりゃすげぇ。
English:
Three of the Hachi Workshops?
That rocks!

Japanese: ガロイ親方＿戦闘中真剣

ケイ、/p、
行くだけ行ってみるぞ。
準備しろ。
English:
Kay, /p, let's go if we're going. 
Get yourselves sorted.
